item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, February 4, 2025 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. El Salvador abandons Bitcoin as legal tender after failed experiment (593 points | 424 comments)
2. The Video Game History Foundation Library Opens in Early Access (100 points | 19 comments)
3. Escaping Surprise Bills and Over-Engineered Messes: Why I Left AWS (25 points | 9 comments)

5. Httptap: View HTTP/HTTPS requests made by any Linux program (433 points | 105 comments)
6. ArXiv LaTeX Cleaner: Clean the LaTeX code of your paper to submit to ArXiv (26 points | discuss)
7. I bought a container full of Chinese electric excavators. Here's what showed up (66 points | 26 comments)
8. Open Euro LLM: Open LLMs for Transparent AI in Europe (112 points | 45 comments)
9. AMD: Microcode Signature Verification Vulnerability (203 points | 85 comments)
10. Cosmologists Try a New Way to Measure the Shape of the Universe (9 points | discuss)

13. Order Declassifying JFK and MLK Assassination Records [pdf] (175 points | 138 comments)
14. Macintosh Allegro Common Lisp (44 points | 7 comments)
15. AI systems with 'unacceptable risk' are now banned in the EU (189 points | 162 comments)

17. I Wrote a WebAssembly VM in C (256 points | 59 comments)

20. Developer Philosophy (201 points | 48 comments)

23. Detroit’s revival takes shape after decades of decay (124 points | 141 comments)
24. First place in Tetris 99 using computer vision, classical AI, a lot of free time (55 points | 38 comments)
25. Anything threatening to be a subculture is commodified before it can walk (2014) (191 points | 209 comments)
26. Auto-AVSR: Audio-Visual Speech Recognition with Automatic Labels (28 points | 1 comment)
27. Efficient Reasoning with Hidden Thinking (143 points | 36 comments)
28. How Translation Works, Book Title Edition (48 points | 17 comments)
29. Hightouch (YC S19) Is Hiring a Distributed Systems Engineer ( | hide)
